misc package¶

Submodules¶

misc.optimization_mixin module¶

class misc.optimization_mixin.OptimizationMixin(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: abc.ABC

The Caching Mixin class is used to store the intermediate optimization results (direct state, adjoint state) for a given control parameters vector. It requires the optimization solver to implement the following methods: - _objective_state: result of the direct computation - _objective : the value of the objective function for an objective state - _jacobian: returns a gradient vector consistent with the control

jacobian(control)[source]¶
minimize(x0, bnds)[source]¶
objective(control)[source]¶
